content:
Today I chose PR 5923 for discussion!

feat(group_theory/perm/sign): Add lemma about (sigma_congr_right σ).sign
Created by @Eric Wieser (@eric-wieser) on 2021-01-27
Labels: WIP, incomplete, merge-conflict

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

There are two definitions in this PR which I think are worth having somewhere - update_one_mul and update_one_hom - can anyone suggests homes and names for these?

The rest of the PR is incomplete, and probably worth of please-adopt
